episodes.title: Episode 12: Children of God Cult
episodes.description: Four siblings who survived the infamous Children of God cult join us for a powerful and deeply personal conversation. They share what it was like growing up inside the cult, how they found the strength to escape, and how those experiences continue to shape their lives today. We also explore the complex dynamics of their relationship with their parents and the road to healing after trauma. Follow them on TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@children_of_god_07 Visit our website: https://www.alphabetmafiapodcast.com/ Subscribe on Apple: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-alphabet-mafia-podcast/id1803501704 Subscribe on Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/3yLAtuUDKCWOE3TNHFdJrc Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/alphabet_mafia_podcast/ Follow us on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@TheAlphabetMafiaPodcast Slam's Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/salim.gauwloos/ Zach's Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/therealzachre/ Podcast music is a remix by Marcett Garcia https://soundcloud.com/marcettgarciamusic
